name: valora_purpose_01
text: I was created for one purpose.
text_simple: i was created for one purpose

name: valora_purpose_02
text: To serve the Children of Light
text_simple: to serve the children of light

name: valora_purpose_03
text: I never questioned.
text_simple: i never questioned

name: valora_purpose_05
text: But the ends they set me to had a dark nature.
text_simple: but the ends they set me to had a dark nature

name: valora_purpose_06
text: Darker than such golden creatures would ever let you think.
text_simple: darker than such golden creatures would ever let you think

name: valora_purpose_07
text: I was created to deliver ultimate power.
text_simple: i was created to deliver ultimate power

name: valora_purpose_08
text: To help the misguided children rid the universe of darkness forever.
text_simple: to help the misguided children rid the universe of darkness forever

name: valora_darkness_01
text: What is darkness and light? Chaos and order?
text_simple: what is darkness and light chaos and order

name: valora_darkness_02
text: Does chaos truly exist more in one than the other? And order?
text_simple: does chaos truly exist more in one than the other and order

name: valora_darkness_03
text: I used to think so... As a righteous creation of light.
text_simple: i used to think so as a righteous creation of light

name: valora_darkness_04
text: But the history of this vast expanse suggests otherwise.
text_simple: but the history of this vast expanse suggests otherwise

name: valora_darkness_05
text: I was shaped to serve the light -- to bend chaos to order and keep the darkness at bay.
text_simple: i was shaped to serve the light to bend chaos to order and keep the darkness at bay

name: valora_darkness_06
text: Until my masters set me upon an impossible mission--
text_simple: until my masters set me upon an impossible mission

name: valora_darkness_07
text: To seize a power they knew to be unobtainable.
text_simple: to seize a power they knew to be unobtainable

name: valora_darkness_08
text: And the price of my failure was to watch all that was dear to me flicker into nothingness...
text_simple: and the price of my failure was to watch all that was dear to me flicker into nothingness

name: valora_darkness_09
text: Without enough strength left in my body to even look away.
text_simple: without enough strength left in my body to even look away

name: valora_test_01
text: For aeons, the Children kept my true purpose from me.
text_simple: for aeons the children kept my true purpose from me

name: valora_test_02
text: Constantly setting me after new challenges, prodding and testing me along the way.
text_simple: constantly setting me after new challenges prodding and testing me along the way

name: valora_test_03
text: I suspect now even they knew the price for failure of my final mission.
text_simple: i suspect now even they knew the price for failure of my final mission

name: valora_test_04
text: But if so...how could they have ever sent me on my way?
text_simple: but if so how could they have ever sent me on my way

name: valora_here_01
text: How did I come to this world? I have not been here long.
text_simple: how did i come to this world i have not been here long

name: valora_here_02
text: Mere hundreds of your tiny lifetimes. Like yours, spent mostly in slumber.
text_simple: mere hundreds of your tiny lifetimes like yours spent mostly in slumber

name: valora_here_03
text: Before that, I floated through the cosmos. Near to lifeless.
text_simple: before that i floated through the cosmos near to lifeless

name: valora_here_04
text: Passive and cold as the faded star from which I was shaped.
text_simple: passive and cold as the faded star from which i was shaped

name: valora_here_05
text: Perhaps some force pulled me to this place.
text_simple: perhaps some force pulled me to this place

name: valora_here_06
text: Or perhaps my derelict course through the cosmos just happened to intersect.
text_simple: or perhaps my derelict course through the cosmos just happened to intersect

name: valora_here_07
text: But given the stakes of the fight before us, I put my faith in the former.
text_simple: but given the stakes of the fight before us i put my faith in the former

name: valora_awakening_01
text: When I awoke here, I knew not where I was.
text_simple: when i awoke here i knew not where i was

name: valora_awakening_02
text: My dreams spanned millenia, and my eyes opened into darkness.
text_simple: my dreams spanned millenia and my eyes opened into darkness

name: valora_awakening_03
text: But somewhere on this world an ageless beacon flared to life.
text_simple: but somewhere on this world an ageless beacon flared to life

name: valora_awakening_04
text: A solar forge set alight by a wandering star -- one much too young for me to know its name.
text_simple: a solar forge set alight by a wandering star one much too young for me to know its name

name: valora_awakening_05
text: And from this forge I began to draw some echo of the Children of Light --
text_simple: and from this forge i began to draw some echo of the children of light

name: valora_awakening_06
text: Whose very breathes formed the first essence of my life.
text_simple: whose very breathes formed the first essence of my life

name: valora_awakening_07
text: In those quiet centuries, I dwelled upon my failures.
text_simple: in those quiet centuries i dwelled upon my failures

name: valora_awakening_08
text: And lamented the loss of my gods.
text_simple: and lamented the loss of my gods

name: valora_awakening_09
text: But I was not created to dwell in darkness.
text_simple: but i was not created to dwell in darkness

name: valora_awakening_10
text: And the world around me could use my hammer still.
text_simple: and the world around me could use my hammer still

name: valora_awakening_11
text: So I have risen to join the world of the living.
text_simple: so i have risen to join the world of the living

name: valora_awakening_12
text: It does not matter if the Children of Light are mere memories --
text_simple: it does not matter if the children of light are mere memories

name: valora_awakening_13
text: This world has need of that memory -- and the light of the first stars, lost though they may be.
text_simple: this world has need of that memory and the light of the first stars lost though they may be

name: valora_children_01
text: The Children of Light were my everything.
text_simple: the children of light were my everything

name: valora_children_02
text: But I cannot tell you much of how they came to be.
text_simple: but i cannot tell you much of how they came to be

name: valora_children_03
text: I know only they were descendants of the keeper's first sun --
text_simple: i know only they were descendants of the keepers first sun

name: valora_children_04
text: One of the earliest and most powerful branches of that now-vast lineage.
text_simple: one of the earliest and most powerful branches of that nowvast lineage

name: valora_children_05
text: They worked as one...but in the darkness they shone as many.
text_simple: they worked as one but in the darkness they shone as many

name: valora_firstdays_01
text: In the ages following my creation, my nature was limited.
text_simple: in the ages following my creation my nature was limited

text_simple: i fought for the glory of the golden ones

text_simple: nave to the lack of my own sense of self

name: valora_firstdays_04
text: But I learned much during aeons of service to the Children.
text_simple: but i learned much during aeons of service to the children

name: valora_firstdays_05
text: By the time of my fateful mission...
text_simple: by the time of my fateful mission

text_simple: i think i should have known better
